channel.title: I need some1 to help me please
channel.description:
hi
i just need somebody to download my client and try to connect because idk if people can. the server has been online for 2 days now and 41 people have downloaded the client yet not 1 person has been online
if you will help me please post a comment bellow and ill pm you the server moperscape page

item.title: I need some1 to help me please
item.dc:creator: @qtst35 qtst35
item.description:
@qtst35 wrote:

i hav just restarted no-ip and restarted the server so lets see if i am nick can connect hopefully he can

Read full topic

i confused

item.source: I need some1 to help me please

item.title: I need some1 to help me please
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“qtst35, post:7, topic:429779”]no because no players have managed to connect

i have set the gui to server ip: marcscape.no-ip.org in the client and everything and i have left clear instructions on where to place the cache included with the client but still nobody seems to ever connect and the client has been downloaded 41 times[/quote]

So you don’t know who has downloaded your client?

Also, do you have your No-IP client running on the computer that the server is hosted on? I just tried to connect and wasn’t able to.

Read full topic

item.title: I need some1 to help me please
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“qtst35, post:1, topic:429779”]hi

i just need somebody to download my client and try to connect because idk if people can.
the server has been online for 2 days now and 41 people have downloaded the client yet not 1 person has been online

if you will help me please post a comment bellow and ill pm you the server moperscape page[/quote]

These types of topics aren’t really allowed.

What you can try is run the server on one computer, and run the client on another one.

Alternatively, you can go to http://www.canyouseeme.org/ and make sure your ports are open.

Read full topic
